trends: There have been 2 other sightings in New Fairfield
There was one other sighting in New Fairfield on or around August 16th 2013
divs: sighting detailssimilar or same object as seen on 8\15\2013 at exact same time 9:29pm. tonight the objects flight path was farther east (by approx. 7 to 10 deg.) but kept to the s to n flight path. objects speed seemed consistent with last sighting. i would estimate that the object covered approx. 30��� in 30 to 50 seconds (at least twice to three times as fast as any "orbital" object that i have ever seen). my belief is that this is a high altitude reconnaissance carft. man i would love to be in that bird.
Summary: Star like object repeats previous flight time and basic path.
